title: Xilisoft.Video.Editor.2.v2.1.1.0901.Incl.Keygen-NapsterBR
description:
Xilisoft Video Editor 2

ENGLISH:
Unleash your creativity. No need to be worried about formats, frame rate or file sizes, the functions of video join, split and cut can be easily achieved by Xilisoft Video Editor. This video editing software allows you to edit video files in various formats like AVI, MPEG, H.264, SWF, MOV, WMV, etc. for playback on popular devices like iPod, iPhone, PSP, PS3, and so on. Take multiple videos in different formats, Xilisoft Video Editor will create an output file in the format you prefer. Splitting can be manual but also automatic according to length of segments or the file size. When it comes to joining files, you can decide the frame rate, bit rate and resolution for an optimized result. As a video joiner, splitter and cutter, Xilisoft Video Editor has an intuitive interface and makes it easy to turn ordinary videos into works of art. And you can watch the original video and the output in the preview window, so you can make sure the result will fulfil your expectations. Xilisoft Video Editor is well worth having a try. Skins are available and this products supports multiple languages including English, German, Spanish, Italian, French, Japanese, Simplified and Traditional Chinese. Join multiple videos and combine them into one. Split one video into several segments. Cut off the unwanted segments of your video.
